column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: Use maximum weight 3kg. As above elbow bending.

column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: Place the foot of your intact limb on the floor.Secure the middle of a rubber exercise band in a doorjamb. Place it at about elbow height.

column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: Grasp one end of the band in each hand with your elbows close to your sides.Smoothly pull both arms back, keeping elbows close to your body. Gently squeeze your shoulder blades together.Hold for a few seconds.Slowly return your arms to starting position

column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: stand up or walk at least once every waking and hold your residual limb pointing to the floor when walking, with your hip straight

column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: Lie on your back. Bend your right knee toward your chest then lower it to the floor. Then bend your left leg and lower it. Always keep the other leg flat

column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: Lie on your back and bend your right knee up. Lift your left leg up as high as your right knee. Then lower it slowly. Repeat with your right leg. Always keep your other foot flat on the floor

column3: need do 30 times for morning ,afternoon, evening
column4: Slowly lift foot up by straightening the knee as far as possible. Return to start position. Relax. Repeat.

column4: Put your hand up hand put yur hand down

column3: 30 minutes
column4: Jumping with both feet and jumping from one foot to the other

column3: 30 minutes
column4: Running 6mph,10min/mile

column3: 30 minutes
column4: General

column3: 30 minutes
column4: 2.8-3.2 miles per hour (mph) on a level

column3: 30 minutes
column4: Feel the Water.Blow Bubbles Underwater.Floating.Kicking

column3: 30minutes
15 minutes
column4: Stand with your legs together and arms at your sides. Lift one knee toward your chest. Lower your leg and repeat with the other knee. Continue alternating knees, pumping your arms up and down.

column3: 15 minutes
column4: Stand with your legs together and arms at your sides.Bring one heel toward your butt. Lower your foot and repeat with the other heel.Continue alternating your heels and pumping your arms

column3: 15 minutes
column4: Stand with your feet hip-width apart, knees and hips bent. Lean forward slightly and brace your core.Lift your right foot, push off your left foot, and move right while keeping your form.Place your feet together. Continue shuffling to the right.Repeat the same steps to the left side.

column3: 15 minutes
column4: Sit on the floor, knees bent and feet flat. Place your hands on the floor under your shoulders, fingers pointing forward.Lift your hips off the floor.

column3: 15 minutes
column4: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Place your hands on the back of your head, elbows pointing outward.Bend to the right, moving your right elbow down and right knee up.Return to starting position. Repeat on the left side

column3: 15 minutes
column4: Start in a curtsy lunge, both knees bent and your right leg diagonally behind you. Bend your right arm and straighten your left arm. Push off your left leg, moving your right leg forward. Bring your left leg diagonally behind you and switch arms

column3: 15 minutes
column4: Stand with your legs together and arms at your sides.Bend your knees slightly. Jump and spread your legs wider than shoulder-width, lifting your arms overhead.

column4: Use maximum weight 3kg. As above elbow bending.
